issue.title: [C++] Add support for Substrait cast expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16550](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16550). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would seem that Substrait treats cast as a dedicated "expression kind" and not a scalar function call.  We should add support for this expression kind.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16550?focusedCommentId=17536291) by Yaron Gvili (rtpsw):*
See [this post](https://github.com/substrait-io/substrait/issues/190#issuecomment-1125306949) about the current Ibis/Substrait/Arrow treatment of casts.
